actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-1396.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 94-1371.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the acceptance of the Joint Committee on the Library on behalf of the Congress, from the U.S. Capitol Historical Society, of preliminary design sketches and funds for murals in the first floor corridors in the House wing of the Capitol, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Joint Committee on the Library to accept, on behalf of the Congress, as a gift from the United States Capitol Historical Society, preliminary design sketches intended as a basic design for murals proposed to be painted on the ceiling and walls of the first floor coridors in the house wing of the United States Capitol.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the acceptance by the Joint Committee on the Library on behalf of the Congress, from the U.S. Capitol Historical Society, of preliminary design sketches and funds for murals in the first floor corridors in the House wing of the Capitol, and for other purposes.
